topic.term: Nucleic acid sites, features and motifs

publication.abstract: FTG is a web server for analyzing nucleotide sequences to predict the genes using Fourier transform techniques. This server implements the existing Fourier transform algorithms for gene prediction and allows the rapid visualization of analysis by output in GIF format.
publication.title: Locating probable genes using Fourier transform approach

summary.description: Web server for locating probable protein coding region in nucleotide sequence using fourier tranform approach.
summary.name: FTG
